snippet: As Newt Gingrich dropped by a polling place at a school just a few blocks from downtown Manchester, he was pounced on by scores of journalists Tuesday morning.
abstract: As Newt Gingrich dropped by a polling place at a school just a few blocks from downtown Manchester, he was pounced on by scores of journalists Tuesday morning.

headline.main: In an Effort to Greet Voters, Gingrich Finds Mainly News Media
